title: shrngAra shrInivAsA
sahitya:
shrngAra shrInivAsA alamElumangai magizhum sarvEshA enrum


anupallavi

  mangA pugazh koNDa mAmalai tirupati tangum kani karuNai pongum venkaTEshA


caraNam    pazha vinaigaL yAvum ODi pADavE nAn nAn Ezhu malai kaDandu un ezhil sannadiyil
kai kuvittEnE en mei marandEnE uivippadO un bhAram mukundanE
				(madhyamkAla)
shankha cakra pItAmbaradhAri mangaLa mAdhava krSNa murAri
pankajAkSa vaikunda vihAri ranganAyakA rAjApUjita
